name: test_e2e_with_logs[012_SQLI_ERR_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERR_001` |
| **Name** | MySQL EXTRACTVALUE error-based |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `EXTRACTVALUE(1,CONCAT(0x7e,version()))`
- **Encoded**: `EXTRACTVALUE(1%2CCONCAT(0x7e%2Cversion()))`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~24000ms
- **Timestamp**: 10:41:35.000 UTC
